Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 June 2024
Reviews.Review Text: These are definitely not what they use to be and they die quickly

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 June 2024
Reviews.Review Text:
I ordered 2 - different colors - one came as a Gen 1 and the other is a Gen 2 (didn't realize there were different generations?)

My 7 and 8 year olds are in tears because they keep their tamagotchis heath and hunger meters full, but never fails, day 3 they start frantically beeping with a skull suddenly die. Once this beeping happens, theres no way to stop it. Dead. Reset, repeat. Day 3 dies for no reason. I don't remember this happening with the Tamagotchis in the 90s. What a waste of money.

I googled and a ton of forums say the same thing is happening to them with Gen 1 and Gen 2, which apparently is what these are. Some say you can't feed it snacks ever. (Dumb, then why is there a snack button then and why is this not mentioned in the instructions??). I don't remember not being able to feed snacks in the 90s. So after the second restart (waste of 6 days, and kids in tears) one of my kids tried to not feed snacks. Still dies for no reason on day 5.

I want my money back. These are a waste of my kids time.

Reviews.Review Text: Ha gustado todo.Buen juguete

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 April 2024
Reviews.Review Text: After receiving the incorrect color, I did get the right one. Besides this, this little Tamagotchi is a blast from the past! People definitely compliment my Tamagotchi which I have hanging from my pant's belt loops! Battery life is surprisingly good too. It's on all the time even when dead and the battery still hasn't died.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 March 2024
Reviews.Review Text: I ordered for my granddaughter and my kids said it did not have any directions. Be prepared to google what to do if it’s new to you.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 March 2024
Reviews.Review Text: It’s still in the box. I’m sure it perfect, just not sure I want to raise it. 😂

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 March 2024
Reviews.Review Text: My eight year old got this as a gift. They haven't changed a bit since I remember them, and that is a good thing! Easy to use and set up - hers grew from a baby to teen to and then two more times to get to an adult. It did take a lot of work and if she didn't catch a sickness right away, it did die pretty quick. She loved feeding and watching it's happiness levels. The range of designs it comes in is great too! We look forward to seeing what we can do with amount of feeding and such to see if we can get different adults. It is a keeper and I would buy it again.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 March 2024
Reviews.Review Text: Got it for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it but when it’s time to clean up poop after her pet it just won’t do it! We looked at the instructions and did it correctly, but it still wouldn’t work so it keeps dying! It’s really cute but the one we got didn’t work well. I’m sure it’s just ours though.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 September 2023
Reviews.Review Text: I bought this for my daughter for her 8th birthday. It’s cute and he loved it until we figured out you can barely see the screen and have to use a flash light. The loudness is obnoxious, but we figured out how to shut that off. I babysat while she was in school. Just before it evolved into an adult, the “B” button stopped working, so we couldn’t care for it and it died. Even I was disappointed after putting so much time and energy into caring for it. I pulled the battery out and reset it, but hours later the same thing happened. Fortunately, we can still return it since we haven’t had it long. I’m not impressed with his boring it really is.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in Brazil on 13 June 2023
Reviews.Review Text: O produto é original o mesmo Tamagotchi dos anos 90, só com com uma nova roupagem no Design de sua carcaça para deixar ele mais moderno aos dias atuais. Mesma jogabilidade e já vem incluido uma bateria nele mesmo pronto para o uso. Como também seu clássico manual. O melhor de tudo é a apresentação da caixa que é decorada com várias ilustrações realmente muito bonita, Bandai Namco está de parabéns.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 May 2023
Reviews.Review Text: Forgot I bought it, was super stoked when I got it. Just like the 90’s it is always on an pretty loud and need constant attention like a real pet. I’m in my 30s and love having it on my keychain I thankfully work in a very loud work environment, so I don’t hear it screaming when it takes a poop while I’m at work. Cute and I’m glad they’re back !! It wouldn’t let me post a pic but I have the cool little duck guy. I like how they kept the technology 90’s simple and didn’t mess with the original layout. 10/10 amusing.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 March 2023
Reviews.Review Text:
This product is great. I use it a lot and its pretty fun. Had tough figuring it out at first but I got through it.
TIPS:
if you need to pause it, go to the clock and press A and C to reset it. keep it at where it says "SET." and your tama will not die, grow, or make noise.

if it is being to loud, simply hold the C button and press A. it will silence your tama. to turn the audio back on, press the C button and press A again.

read the instructions for how to use the icons on your tama.

overall great toy. 11/10.

Reviews.Date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 March 2023
Reviews.Review Text: I got this as a Christmas present for my 8 year old daughter... How nostalgic. These things were very cool when I was a kid. I can't believe they came back into "style"... I was super excited for her as I knew how much I enjoyed mine as a kid but they are just not made the same. After a month it quit working. It does not respond to the buttons/commands, or do the activities it is supposed to do. Battery is not dead. Would not recommend.
